summary: AN ORDINANCE revising the Animal Control Code (Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 9.25); establishing an administrative process for destroying vicious or dangerous animals; requiring rabies vaccinations for dogs and cats and proof of insurance for guard or attack dogs; and making other changes; amending Sections 9.20.020, -.023, -.025C, -.030, -.046, -.047, -.050, -.054, -.080, -.081, -.082, -.091, -.110, and -.120; adding new Sections 9.25.035, -.036 and -.037; and repealing Chapter 9.22.
